value.title: New MIT brain research shows how AI could help us understand consciousness
value.excerpt: A team of researchers from MIT and Massachusetts General Hospital recently published a study linking social awareness to individual neuronal activity. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first time evidence for the ‘theory of mind‘ has been identified at this scale.

value.title: MIT CSAIL claims its breast cancer prediction AI works equally well across demographic groups
value.excerpt: Researchers at MIT CSAIL developed a breast cancer risk prediction algorithm that works equally well across patient groups.

value.title: This is the robot that would be mass-manufactured to support the pandemic

value.title: Researchers create new model to evaluate AI-generated navigation instructions

value.title: Amnesty International calls for ban on facial recognition
value.excerpt: As advocates for facial recognition tout the tech’s potential to track down the US Capitol rioters, a new Amnesty International campaign has provided a timely reminder of the software’s dangers.

value.title: 14 Ways To Better Leverage AI To Connect With Consumers

value.title: State-Of-The-Art Applied Artificial Intelligence Defined

value.title: Synthetic Biology Partners With AI To Delete Food Allergies
value.excerpt: Binur and fellow co-founder Yanay Ofran began Ukko in 2016 in an attempt to shift the paradigm on food allergies. Their mission seems to have struck a chord. The company recently announced a $40M Series B funding round to advance its efforts in ending food allergies for good.

value.title: The Race To Outsmart The Competition: Adobe Unveils New AI Tools For Retailers
value.excerpt: Tech companies are vying to offer retailers ways to create smarter, seamless, and personalized online shopping experiences. Adobe unveils its new tools that use AI and data.

value.title: The Role Artificial Intelligence is Playing In the Healthcare Sector
value.excerpt: With modern technology making business operations convenient, fraudsters are also banking on advanced technology for their illicit activities. Cybercriminals are now targeting the healthcare sector for their illegal gains.
